headline: UPS Near-Term Outlook Is Favorable Despite Margin Concerns, Analyst Upgrades Stock
summary: BMO Capital Markets analyst Fadi Chamoun upgraded United Parcel Service, Inc. (NYSE:UPS) to Outperform from Market Perform and reduced the target price to $150 (from $155). The analyst writes that they still have concerns about the trajectory of UPS’s Domestic operating margins in the medium-to-long term. Chamoun notes the combination of cyclical tailwinds, moderating unit cost inflation, positive contributions from cost reduction programs, and a low valuation make the near-term risk/reward favo

headline: UPS Stock Just Got Upgraded. The Bottom Might Be Here.
summary: On Tuesday, BMO analyst Fadi Chamoun raised his UPS stock rating to Buy from Hold, and says the near-term picture is favorable.

raw.headline: UPS Stock Just Got Upgraded. The Bottom Might Be Here.
raw.summary: On Tuesday, BMO analyst Fadi Chamoun raised his UPS stock rating to Buy from Hold, and says the near-term picture is favorable.

headline: eBay, Centene and Oscar Health, UPS: Top Analyst Calls
summary: Online marketplace and e-commerce platform eBay (EBAY) was downgraded to Underperform from Hold by Jefferies analysts. The Jefferies team also cut Centene's (CNC) stock rating from Hold to Underperform, while initiating coverage on Oscar Health (OSCR) with an Underperform rating and price target of $12 per share. BMO Capital Markets upgraded courier and logistics operator United Parcel Service (UPS) to Outperform. Editor's Note: At 0:41, Yahoo Finance incorrectly stated UPS was downgraded by BMO Capital Markets when it was, in fact, an upgrade to Outperform. We apologize for the error. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.

headline: BMO upgrades UPS to 'outperform’ amid improving market conditions
summary: Investing.com -- United Parcel Service Inc (NYSE:UPS) to “outperform” from “marketperform,” amid an improving market condition, moderating cost pressures, and a compelling valuation as drivers for near-term upside.

headline: 3 Magnificent S&P 500 Dividend Stock Down 35% to Buy and Hold Forever
summary: The S&P 500 is at an all-time high.  Here are three magnificent S&P 500 dividend stocks down 35% or more to buy and hold forever.  Shares of oil and gas producer Occidental Petroleum (NYSE: OXY) are roughly 47% below the high set in late 2022.
